column1: Destruction of the AX5000!•Check the rated voltage and current of the servo drive and the connected motors.•Once the AX5000 has been disconnected from the mains supply, (emergency off, mains contactor etc.),wait at least 3 minutes before switching it on again or query the status of IDN "P-0-0205" (see "IDN de-scription" in the documentation).
